rules_text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may pay 3 life. If you do, create a Shard token. [i](It's an enchantment with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]He watched the sun rise and the kingdom fall, now his face reflects on the shards of history.[/i]
